text: long long int min ( long long int c , long long int d ) { long long int mini = ( c < d ) ? c : d ; return mini ; } int main ( ) { int t , i ; long long int a [ 2 ] , x , n , u ; long long int cost ; do { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; } while ( t < 1 || t > 10 ) ; while ( t -- ) { do { scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; } while ( n < 2 || n > 50000 ) ; scanf ( "%lld%lld" , & a [ 0 ] , & a [ 1 ] ) ; x = min ( a [ 0 ] , a [ 1 ] ) ; cost = x ; if ( n == 2 ) { printf ( "%lld\n" , cost ) ; continue ; } for ( i = 2 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ 1 ] ) ; u = min ( x , a [ 1 ] ) ; x = u ; cost += x ; } printf ( "%lld\n" , cost ) ; } }
